import { useState } from "react" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { prods1 } from "../assets/prods1" import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" import { FaRupeeSign } from "react-icons/fa" import Sidebar from "./Sidebar" import Navbar from "./Navbar" //import {} from 'fs' function Aitem(){ const ff=['note','name','price','rating'] const [imgg,setImgg]=useState() const [note,setNote]=useState('') const [slug,setSlug]=useState('') const [price,setPrice]=useState(0) const [rating,setRating]=useState(3.5) const [imgurl,setImgurl]=useState('../../up.png') const [cat,setCat]=useState('') const nav=useNavigate() const cats=['toys','stationary','books','bags','bottles'] const aitems=prods1 const [data,setData]=useState({_id:aitems[aitems.length-1]._id-1, slug:'', price:0, cat:'', note:'', imgurl:'', rating:4, price1:0,}) async function handleS(){ alert(aitems.length) prods1.push( {_id:aitems[aitems.length-1]._id-1, slug:slug, price:price, cat:cat, note:note, imgurl:imgurl, rating:4, price1:price, }) alert(note)} const handleC=(e)=>{ const name=e.target.name const val=e.target.value setData(data=>({...data,[name]:val})) } return(<>

{ff.map(item=>( ))}
NAME VALUE
{handleC(e) }} >
{setImgg(e.target.files[0]) ;setImgurl( '../../'+e.target.value.split('\\')[e.target.value.split('\\').length-1])}} >


)} export default Aitem
